Create personalized journeys across all: 通过我们的客户参与平台创建跨越所有渠道的个人化旅程。
\n**Site ID:**\n\n\nPlease log in and go:
**Site ID:** Please log in and go to Settings, click [here](https://fly.customer.io/settings/api_credentials). **Tracking API Key:** Please log in and go to Settings, click [here](https://fly.customer.io/settings/api_credentials). **APP API Token:** Please log in and find it in Account Settings, click [here](https://fly.customer.io/settings/api_credentials?keyType=app).
Please note that the Track API Key and App API Key are different. You can read more about it [here](https://customer.io/docs/accounts-and-workspaces/managing-credentials/).
Track Custom API Call: 跟踪自定义 API 呼叫
App Custom API Call: 应用自定义 API 呼叫
Create an event in Customer.io: 在 Customer.io 中创建一个事件
CustomerIO 跟踪自定义 API 调用 (tack.customer.io)

代表一个人的独特价值。 您可以通过ID、电子邮件地址或 cio_id (当更新人员时)，根据您的工作区设置来识别一个人
